attributes.additional_details: We ask that the Government provides a means grant for 16-19 Further Education students that are not in receipt of any income that accomidates for day to day living expences such as: food, clothes, socialising etc. We belive that students in full time education should be on equal ammounts if not more (at least there doing something with their life) to what people who are in reciept of Jobseekers are on. We do not feel that people trying to make something of their lives should be discriminated against.
